```{r}
#| warning: false
  
library(PhyloSim)
```

### define params and run model

```{r}
par1 <- createCompletePar(x = 100,
                         y = 100,
                         dispersal = "global",
                         runs = c(1,2, 10,11, 100,101, 1000,1001, 10000,10001
                                  # 10000,10001,
                                  # 100000,100001, 200000,200001, 300000,300001,
                                  # 400000,400001, 500000,500001, 600000,600001
                                  ),
                         specRate = 2,
                         density = 0, # NDD (but not Conspecific)
                         environment = 0,
                         fitnessActsOn = "mortality",
                         fitnessBaseMortalityRatio = 0, # equal traits -> mortality
                         densityCut = FALSE,
                         seed = 20250408,
                         type = "base",
                         protracted = 0,
                         fission = 0,
                         redQueen = 0,
                         redQueenStrength = 0,
                         airmat = NA,
                         scenario = "null")

simu <- runSimulation(par1) # run 30h and didn't finish
```

```{r}
saveRDS(simu, "/home/andy/local/runs/20250408_null")
```

### visualize results

```{r}
plotSpatialPhylo(simu)
```
